entry.title: 2017 brings Soul Scents into its 25th year!
entry.content:
Serving wholesale customers across the country since 1992, Soul Scents Wholesale enters its next quarter century under new ownership.

Shannon Burchell has taken the reigns and brings along 15 years of experience in the Health Food Industry to her role.

Soul Scents will continue to distribute high quality, fair trade products to stores and small businesses across Canada. Always on the lookout for new and unique products that are heart-warming and full of integrity, we look forward to working with you and sharing our enthusiasm for every product that we sell.

Soul Scents is now located in Ottawa and orders arrive from across Canada by fax, phone or e-mail which are then boxed up and shipped out via Canpar or Canada Post.

We’ve got a beautiful line of products here, we hope you like what you see!

Shannon & Family
